Question_1: How would you rate the clarity and focus of the main ideas presented in the essay?
Question_2: How would you rate the effectiveness of the supporting details in developing the main ideas?
Question_3: How would you rate the thoroughness and balance of the explanation or exploration of the topic?
Question_4: How would you rate the relevance and suitability of the content and selected details to the audience and purpose?
Question_5: How would you rate the use of resources to provide strong, accurate, and credible support for the main ideas?
Question_6: How would you rate the ability of the writing to hold the reader's attention throughout the essay?
Question_7: How would you rate the ability of the main ideas to stand out and be developed by strong support and rich details?
Question_8: How would you rate the ability of the writing to make connections and share insights about the topic?
Question_9: How would you rate the overall control and organization of the essay?
Question_10: How would you rate the ability of the essay to explore or explain the topic in a thorough and in-depth manner?
